title: President Donald J. Trump Is Taking Action to Promote Good Governance and Accountability Within the Federal Workforce â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			
Issued on:
October 21, 2020
To empower our civil servants to best help others, the government must always operate more efficiently and more securely.
						President Donald J. Trump					ENHANCING ACCOUNTABILITY: President Donald J. Trump is taking action to increase accountability for Federal employees who make substantive contributions to executive branch policy.
